summary:
**Alien: Covenant (2017)** is a sci-fi horror movie directed by Ridley Scott. It's the sixth film in the Alien series and a sequel to *Prometheus*. The story follows a colony ship's crew who land on a new planet and find something scary. 

Filming started in New Zealand in 2016. The movie premiered in London in May 2017 and got good reviews, but it didn't make as much money as expected. It stars Michael Fassbender and Katherine Waterston.
title: Alien Covenant
